original_text: Then I will say to myself, ‘You have plenty of things stored safely. These will be enough for you for many years. Now you can live an easy life. Eat and drink as much as you want. Enjoy yourself.’ ”
korean_text: 또 내가 내 영혼에게 이르되 영혼아 여러 해 쓸 물건을 많이 쌓아 두었으니 평안히 쉬고 먹고 마시고 즐거워하자 하리라 하되

sentences.original_text: Then I will say to myself
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 내가 나 자신에게 말하겠지

sentences.original_text: You have plenty of things stored safely
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 안전하게 저장된 많은 것들을 가지고 있구나

sentences.original_text: These will be enough for you for many years
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들은 너에게 여러 해 동안 충분할 거야

sentences.original_text: Now you can live an easy life
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너는 편안한 삶을 살 수 있어

sentences.original_text: Eat and drink as much as you want
sentences.korean_translation: 먹고 마시되 원하는 만큼 마음껏 하렴
